text: yadi tum faisala chaahate ho to faisala tumhaare saamane aa chuka aur yadi baaz aa jao to yah tumhaare hee lie achchha hai. lekin yadi tumane palatakar phir vahee harakat kee to ham bhee palatenge aur tumhaara jattha, chaahe vah kitana hee adhik ho, tumhaare kuchh kaam na aa sakega. aur yah ki allaah mominon ke saath hota hai
